title: Managing the Authorization Server - MediationZone Documentation 9.3 - InfoZone
text: To use the Authorization Server service, there are several steps to take to enable the server as described in Enabling Authorization Server . For more information on the parameters found in the Authorization Server template, refer to Authorization Server Properties . Loading
